oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Fan Fair International Show - 1980-06-14 - Tape # 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Recording is of the main stage recordings of the Fan Fair International Show. The recording comes from June 14, 1980. The tape features: host, Ronnie Prophet (musician/comedian); performer, Dave Travis (musician); performer, Marie Gibson (musician); performance group, Hawkins Brothers (musical group). Tape is labeled tape one of an unknown number of tapes.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Ronnie Prophet; Dave Travis; Marie Gibson; Hawkin Brothers
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:23) Unidentified introduction tune ([Unidentified]) -- (01:08) An unidentified voice introduces Ronnie Prophet -- (01:20) Everybody Needs a Love Song (Ronnie Prophet) -- (04:12) Prophet greets the crowd and introduces Dave Travis -- (05:31) Night Train Back to Memphis (Dave Travis) -- (09:44) Dave Travis reflects on the international crowd present -- (10:11) Lead Me on (Dave Travis) -- (14:10) Travis addresses the crowd and praises the musicians -- (14:57) Take a Little Walk With Me (Dave Travis) -- (17:41) Prophet praises Travis and introduces Marie Gibson -- (18:15) Georgie (Marie Gibson) -- (20:50) Gibson recalls discussing where she wished to live, and Gibson praises Hank Williams -- (21:22) Your Cheatin' Heart (Marie Gibson) -- (24:04) Gibson expresses her thanks -- (24:27) Whatever I Say Means I Love You (Marie Gibson) -- (27:22) Prophet praises Gibson, and Prophet reflects on Australia and the Hawkin Brothers; additionally, Prophet reflects on the size of the show while the Hawkin Brothers prepare -- (31:29) Boil Them Cabbage Down (Hawkin Brothers) -- (35:22) The Hawkin Brothers introduce "Good Morning Australia, We're Proud to be With You" -- (35:55) Good Morning Australia, We're Proud to be With You (Hawkin Brothers) -- (38:43) The Hawkin Brothers show their thanks to the crowd -- (39:17) One Day at a Time (Hawkin Brothers) -- (42:13) Prophet praises the Hawkin Brothers and introduces Charlie Daniels -- (44:05) Blueberry Hill [featuring Ronnie Prophet voiceover] (Ronnie Prophet) -- (44:52) Prophet addresses the crowd -- (45:05) Prophet yodels and unidentified tune -- (46:10) Prophet reflects on Texas and impersonates Ernest Tubb -- (47:16) I'm Walking the Floor Over You (Ronnie Prophet) -- (48:00) Prophet reflects on Kitty Wells, Johnny Cash and Donald Duck and impersonates their singing styles -- (51:48) Prophet praises Randall Prescott and the entire accompanying crew -- (52:56) The Auctioneer (Ronnie Prophet) -- (54:48) The Auctioneer [featuring Prophet impersonations] (Ronnie Prophet)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Prophet, Ronnie; Travis, Dave; Gobson, Marie; Hawkins Brothers (Musical group);
